\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	{A_1} & \color{rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}{A_2} & \color{rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}{A_3} & {\,} \\
	{B_1} & \color{rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}{B_2} & \color{rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}{B_3} & {\,} \\
	& {C_2} & {C_3} & {\,} \\
	& {\,} & {\,}
	\arrow["{f_A}", tail, from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["{g_A}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, two heads, from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{i_2}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, tail, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{\delta _A}", from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow["{i_3}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, tail, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{f_B}", tail, from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{g_B}", color={rgb,255:red,51;green,75;blue,255}, two heads, from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow["{p_2}", two heads, from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow["{\delta _B}", from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{p_3}", two heads, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\varepsilon _2}", from=3-2, to=4-2]
	\arrow["{\varepsilon _3}", from=3-3, to=4-3]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
